question: Supply business
answer:
QUESTION
We are 4 freinds who are patner in supply business. iam javaid. last month i  win a contract totally on my behaf and i did its total workout. i only got project money from my three freinds and i did not invest my money saying my hard work is myu investment. now we gwt one lac rupee profit from that project which i have won and worked out.
but my three patner say that they will keep 50 thousand and will divide into investers of money but i will not get anything in that. the other half that is fifty thousand will be divided into 4 patners and i will get mu fourth  share out of that 50 thousand. they say that this is ' Sharyah'

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh.
